{"summary":"Write tests for model retry and fallback telemetry in /code responses.","project":{"language":"python"},"files":[{"path":"tests/test_model_retry_fallback.py","content":""""Tests for model retry and fallback telemetry in /code responses."""

from __future__ import annotations

import importlib.util
import sys
from pathlib import Path


def _load_cli_module():
    root = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1]
    cli_path = root / "scripts" / "elephant_cli.py"
    spec = importlib.util.spec_from_file_location("elephant_cli_local", cli_path)
    if spec is None or spec.loader is None:
        raise RuntimeError("Unable to load scripts/elephant_cli.py")
    module = importlib.util.module_from_spec(spec)
    sys.modules[spec.name] = module
    spec.loader.exec_module(module)
    return module


elephant_cli = _load_cli_module()


def test_retry_fallback_telemetry_on_retryable_error(tmp_path: Path, monkeypatch):
    """Verify telemetry records retry attempts and fallback selection on retryable errors."""
    (tmp_path / "pyproject.toml").write_text("[project]\nname='tmp'\n", encoding="utf-8")
    monkeypatch.setenv("ELEPHANT_PROJECT_ROOT", str(tmp_path))

    # Simulate retryable errors for first two models, success on fallback
    original_chat = elephant_cli.OpenRouterClient.chat_completion

    call_tracker = {"attempts": 0, "models": []}

    def mock_chat_completion(self, *, model, messages, max_tokens, temperature=0.2, timeout_sec=60):
        call_tracker["attempts"] += 1
        call_tracker["models"].append(model)
        if call_tracker["attempts"] <= 2:
            raise elephant_cli.OpenRouterError("HTTP 429: Rate limit exceeded")
        return elephant_cli.OpenRouterResult(
            content='{"plan_steps":[],"cot_steps":[]}',
            usage={"prompt_tokens": 10, "completion_tokens": 10, "total_tokens": 20},
            estimated_cost_usd=0.001,
            raw={"choices": [{"message": {"content": '{"plan_steps":[],"cot_steps":[]}'}}], "usage": {"prompt_tokens": 10, "completion_tokens": 10, "total_tokens": 20}},
        )

    monkeypatch.setattr(elephant_cli.OpenRouterClient, "chat_completion", mock_chat_completion)

    args = elephant_cli._parse(["code", "--cwd", str(tmp_path), "--task", "add feature", "--output", "json"])
    code, response = elephant_cli.execute_command(args)

    assert code == 0
    assert response["ok"] is True
    assert call_tracker["attempts"] == 3
    assert call_tracker["models"][0] == "gpt-4o-mini"
    assert call_tracker["models"][1] == "gpt-4o"
    assert call_tracker["models"][2] == "claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022"
    assert response["metrics"]["model_retries"] == 2
    assert response["metrics"]["model_fallbacks"] == ["gpt-4o", "claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022"]


def test_retry_fallback_telemetry_on_fatal_error(tmp_path: Path, monkeypatch):
    """Verify telemetry stops retrying on fatal errors and records them."""
    (tmp_path / "pyproject.toml").write_text("[project]\nname='tmp'\n", encoding="utf-8")
    monkeypatch.setenv("ELEPHANT_PROJECT_ROOT", str(tmp_path))

    original_chat = elephant_cli.OpenRouterClient.chat_completion

    call_tracker = {"attempts": 0}

    def mock_chat_completion(self, *, model, messages, max_tokens, temperature=0.2, timeout_sec=60):
        call_tracker["attempts"] += 1
        raise elephant_cli.OpenRouterError("HTTP 401: Invalid API key")

    monkeypatch.setattr(elephant_cli.OpenRouterClient, "chat_completion", mock_chat_completion)

    args = elephant_cli._parse(["code", "--cwd", str(tmp_path), "--task", "add feature", "--output", "json"])
    code, response = elephant_cli.execute_command(args)

    assert code != 0
    assert response["ok"] is False
    assert call_tracker["attempts"] == 1  # No retries on fatal error
    assert response["metrics"]["model_retries"] == 0
    assert response["metrics"]["model_fallbacks"] == []


def test_retry_fallback_telemetry_no_retry_needed(tmp_path: Path, monkeypatch):
    """Verify telemetry reports zero retries when first model succeeds."""
    (tmp_path / "pyproject.toml").write_text("[project]\nname='tmp'\n", encoding="utf-8")
    monkeypatch.setenv("ELEPHANT_PROJECT_ROOT", str(tmp_path))

    def mock_chat_completion(self, *, model, messages, max_tokens, temperature=0.2, timeout_sec=60):
        return elephant_cli.OpenRouterResult(
            content='{"plan_steps":[],"cot_steps":[]}',
            usage={"prompt_tokens": 10, "completion_tokens": 10, "total_tokens": 20},
            estimated_cost_usd=0.001,
            raw={"choices": [{"message": {"content": '{"plan_steps":[],"cot_steps":[]}'}}], "usage": {"prompt_tokens": 10, "completion_tokens": 10, "total_tokens": 20}},
        )

    monkeypatch.setattr(elephant_cli.OpenRouterClient, "chat_completion", mock_chat_completion)

    args = elephant_cli._parse(["code", "--cwd", str(tmp_path), "--task", "add feature", "--output", "json"])
    code, response = elephant_cli.execute_command(args)

    assert code == 0
    assert response["ok"] is True
    assert response["metrics"]["model_retries"] == 0
    assert response["metrics"]["model_fallbacks"] == []


def test_is_retryable_model_error():
    """Verify retryable error classification."""
    assert elephant_cli._is_retryable_model_error("HTTP 429: Rate limit exceeded") is True
    assert elephant_cli._is_retryable_model_error("HTTP 504: Gateway timeout") is True
    assert elephant_cli._is_retryable_model_error("Network error: Connection refused") is True
    assert elephant_cli._is_retryable_model_error("HTTP 401: Invalid API key") is False
    assert elephant_cli._is_retryable_model_error("HTTP 400: Bad request") is False


def test_is_fatal_model_error():
    """Verify fatal error classification."""
    assert elephant_cli._is_fatal_model_error("HTTP 401: Invalid API key") is True
    assert elephant_cli._is_fatal_model_error("HTTP 400: Bad request") is True
    assert elephant_cli._is_fatal_model_error("HTTP 429: Rate limit exceeded") is False
    assert elephant_cli._is_fatal_model_error("HTTP 504: Gateway timeout") is False
